Password¶

class Password.Password[source]¶
decrypt(encrypted_password, key)[source]¶

Decrypts an encrypted password given a key

Parameters:
  • encrypted_password – password to be decrypted
  • key – the key needed to decrypt the password
Returns:

String – the decrypted password.
encrypt(password, key)[source]¶

Encrypts the given password using the given key

Parameters:
  • password – the password to be encrypted
  • key – the key used to encrypt the password
Retuns:

String – the encrypted password
generate()[source]¶

Generates a password

Dependencies: special, digits, uppercase and lowercase (either True or False)

generate_hash(password)[source]¶

Generates a hash by a given user password

Parameters:password – the password to be hashed
Returns:String – the hashed password
generate_key()[source]¶

Generates a new key

Returns:an array representing the key
import_key(key)[source]¶

Imports a key

Returns:the decoded key
set_digits(to_generate)[source]¶

Allows/forbids the generation of digits

Parameters:to_generate – boolean
set_length(length)[source]¶

Sets the length of an automatically generated password

Param:length - the length of the password to be generated
set_lowercase(to_generate)[source]¶

Allows/forbids the generation of lowercases

Parameters:to_generate – boolean
set_uppercase(to_generate)[source]¶

Allows/forbids the generation of uppercases

Parameters:to_generate – boolean

Allows/forbids the generation of special special_symbols

Parameters:to_generate – boolean

class Database.Database[source]¶
clear_passwords()[source]¶

Resets the Password database

clear_users()[source]¶

Resets the User database

Given a username returns its hashed password

Parameters:username – the username to extract the hash from
Returns:String – the hashed password
get_user_id(username)[source]¶

Given a username returns the Database ID of that user

Parameters:username – the username to get the ID from
Returns:Int – the ID of the user

Prints all (hashed) password from Passwords database

Prints all users from User database

User¶

class User.User[source]¶
add_data(destination, password)[source]¶

Adds destination and password to user represented by the object its called from

Parameters:
  • destination – the desination the passwords belongs to
  • password – the password for the destination
auth(username, password)[source]¶

Authenticates the user Warning: If the authentication fails, data could not be added or extracted from the Database

Parameters:
  • username – the username of the user
  • password – the password of the user
create(user, password)[source]¶

Creates a new user

Parameters:
  • user – the username of the user
  • password – the password of the new user

Parameters:desination – the destination to extract the password from
Returns:String – the decrypted password
